function NPC_512005:Init( NPCID ) NPC_512005.BufIdElectricField = 40310 end
function NPC_512005:OnSpawn( SpawnInfo ) --GLog( "NPC_512005:OnSpawn\n" ) --SpawnInfo.NPC:SetDecayTime(0)-- 번개구가 죽어도 사운드가 계속 반복되어 시체를 바로 사라지게 했다. 티켓해결되면 삭제해도 됨. end
function NPC_512005:OnCombatBegin()
this:GainBuff( NPC_512005.BufIdElectricField ) this:SetTimer( 1, NPC_512002.TTLElectricOrb, false ) end
function NPC_512005:OnTimer( Index ) --GLog( "NPC_512005:OnTimer" .. Index .. "\n" ) if Index == 1 then
this:RemoveBuff( NPC_512005.BufIdElectricField ) this:Despawn(false) return end end
function NPC_512005:OnFinishBomb( ThisActor, Enemy ) --GLog( "NPC_512005:OnFinishBomb\n" )
local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) this:RemoveBuff( NPC_512005.BufIdElectricField ) ThisNPC:Despawn(false) end
